message.title: You’ve updated Mozilla VPN
message.subtitle: You’re using the latest version of Mozilla VPN.

blocks.content: This update includes minor bug fixes, UI adjustments and other performance improvements, including:

content.content: The ability to sign in using your Google or Apple account
A new “My Devices” screen that makes it easier to view and manage your devices
The ability to upgrade to an annual plan from within the app
Improved guidance for fixing VPN connection issues
Personalized suggestions for apps to exclude from VPN protection
More easily accessible help content throughout the app

blocks.content: Thank you for installing the latest version
